Package com.github.gwtd3.api.time

Class Summary
Interval Time class performing simple time arithmetic.
Time D3 includes a helper module for parsing and formatting dates modeled after the venerable strptime and strftime C-library standards.
TimeFormat  
TimeFormat.Builder  
TimeScale D3's time scale is an extension of LinearScale that uses JavaScript Date objects as the domain representation.
